statements: DELETE FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE user_id = 500 AND transaction_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE transaction_id = 1001 AND user_id = 500
DELETE FROM fraud_detection WHERE fraudulent = TRUE AND reason = 'Suspicious';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND user_id = 50;
DELETE FROM fraud_detection WHERE fraudulent = TRUE AND reason = 'Suspicious transaction';
DELETE FROM fraudulent_transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01' AND fraudulent_flag = TRUE;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01' AND amount > 1000;
